input.sentences: the group leader says hello to all the arrivals at the carnival .
all the gang is very happy to see each other once again .
the friends pose for a group picture to document the day .
the slide was lots of fun and all had a great time .
the carnival went on into the night and we enjoyed all the lights and excitement .
output.sentences: Janet, a foster mother, decided to take here foster children to an amusement park.
This was their first time to go there and they were so happy they all shared a group hug.
Then the happy gang posed for a group photo.
Everyone enjoyed the water slide during the day.
They stayed until closing time so they could see the park illuminated with colorful lights.
